summary: One click, one spell. Aint that simple enough?
descriptionHtml:
One click, one spell. Ain't that simple enough? You still need 1 sec to cast the ritual spells though.
I don't know if someone has made a similar thing. If yes shoot me the link and I'll do what's good.


* I'm gathering talents to make the massive unofficial DLC Dominion, urgently need CK workers, voice actors/actresses/editors, papyrus scripters and concept artists!
Visit this page to know more: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1279053-the-elder-scrolls-v-dominion-recruiting-talents/*
